newsitem.title: EU: EP ENERGY COMMITTEE AGENDA - SEPT 2-3.
newsitem.headline: EP ENERGY COMMITTEE AGENDA - SEPT 2-3.

text.p: Committee on Research, Technological Development and Energy

===] In the presence of the Council and Commission 2. Approval of minutes of meetings of: - 2/3/4 June 1996 - Delegation Sicily (PE218.172 ) - 10/11 June 1996 in Brussels (PE218.165 ) - 18 June 1996 in Strasbourg (to be controled) (PE218.173 ) 3. Chairman's announcements 4. Any other business 5. Improving energy efficiency: continuation of the SAVE programme after 1995 ( CO2 strategy) (T03884) **II (T03884) SYN95131 COM(96)0195 C4-0375/96 + ENER Fond R BLOCH von B. (V ) - Consideration of Common Position of Council 6. 1997 budget - Section III (T04556) (T04556) BUD0074 COM(96)0300 C4-0350/96 + ENER Avis A McNALLY Eryl M.
